channel.title: Ember Weekend
channel.description: Ember.js is a frontend JavaScript framework that has exciting applications. In this podcasts we share news, events, and some of our experiences.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Latest Ember.js news, events, and interesting tidbits.
channel.itunes:author: Chase McCarthy & Jonathan Jackson
channel.itunes:summary: Ember.js is a frontend JavaScript framework that has exciting applications. In this podcasts we share news, events, and some of our experiences.

item.title: Episode 7: Champions needed
item.description: Chase and Jonathan discuss routable components, ember-cli-mirage (again), JSON API, and the new EmberJax twitter account.
item.itunes:author: Chase McCarthy & Jonathan Jackson
item.itunes:subtitle: Chase and Jonathan discuss routable components, ember-cli-mirage (again), JSON API, and the new EmberJax twitter account.

item.title: Episode 6: Ember in Atlanta
item.description: Chase and Jonathan recap their RailsConf experience and talk about Ember meetups
item.itunes:author: Chase McCarthy & Jonathan Jackson
item.itunes:subtitle: Chase and Jonathan recap their RailsConf experience and talk about Ember meetups

item.title: Episode 5: Wicked Good Design
item.description: Chase and Jonathan discuss the site redesign, Wicked Good Ember, Ember in Viewport, security patches, the run loop, and Ember Islands.
item.itunes:author: Chase McCarthy & Jonathan Jackson
item.itunes:subtitle: Chase and Jonathan discuss the site redesign, Wicked Good Ember, Ember in Viewport, security patches, the run loop, and Ember Islands.

item.title: Episode 4: IE: Seeya L8er
item.description: Chase and Jonathan talk Polymer, Ember 2.0 training, Netflix's freedom of responsiblity, and spend some extra time talking about IE8 support.
item.itunes:author: Chase McCarthy & Jonathan Jackson
item.itunes:subtitle: Chase and Jonathan talk Polymer, Ember 2.0 training, Netflix's freedom of responsiblity, and spend some extra time talking about IE8 support.

item.title: Episode 3: Broccoli, but not the vegetable
item.description: Chase and Jonathan talk turbolinks, broccoli, and ember-watson. Spending a little more time than usual discussing the new broccoli tree api.
item.itunes:author: Chase McCarthy & Jonathan Jackson
item.itunes:subtitle: Chase and Jonathan talk turbolinks, broccoli, and ember-watson. Spending a little more time than usual discussing the new broccoli tree api.

item.title: Episode 2: The Weekend Strikes Back
item.description: Chase and Jon discuss Ember's new versioned guides, testing in Ember CLI, and an Ember dependency guide for Rubyists.
item.itunes:author: Chase McCarthy & Jonathan Jackson
item.itunes:subtitle: Chase and Jon discuss Ember's new versioned guides, testing in Ember CLI, and an Ember dependency guide for Rubyists.

item.title: Episode 1: Our First Foray
item.description: Chase and Jon kick off Ember Weekend discussing EmberSherpa's workshop, EmberObserver, and some resources for beginners.
item.itunes:author: Chase McCarthy & Jonathan Jackson
item.itunes:subtitle: Chase and Jon kick off Ember Weekend discussing EmberSherpa's workshop, EmberObserver, and some resources for beginners.
